summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2011 FORD FUSION. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE VEHICLE LOST POWER STEERING ABILITY. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 15V340000(STEERING); HOWEVER, THE PARTS TO DO THE REPAIR WERE UNAVAILABLE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE RECALL REPAIR. THE O C WELCH FORD DEALER WAS CONTACTED AND REFUSED TO DO THE REPAIR DUE TO THE MANUFACTURER'S QUALIFICATIONS FOR THE RECALL. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE ISSUE AND DID NOT OFFER ASSISTANCE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 151,000. PARTS DISTRIBUTION DISCONNECT.
